description: Real activities per destination - based on actual Klook tours

dubai.title: Burj Khalifa At the Top - 124th & 125th Floor Observation Deck
dubai.description: Experience breathtaking 360-degree views of Dubai from the world's tallest building. Skip the queues with priority access to the 124th and 125th floor observation decks. Marvel at the Palm Jumeirah, Dubai Marina, and the Arabian Gulf from 452 meters above ground.
dubai.shortDescription: Skip-the-line access to Burj Khalifa's observation decks with panoramic city views

dubai.title: Dubai Desert Safari with BBQ Dinner & Live Entertainment
dubai.description: Experience the magic of the Arabian desert with an unforgettable evening safari. Enjoy thrilling dune bashing in a 4x4, camel rides, sandboarding, and henna painting. Watch a stunning desert sunset before indulging in a traditional BBQ dinner with belly dancing and tanoura shows.
dubai.shortDescription: Evening desert adventure with dune bashing, camel ride, BBQ dinner and shows

dubai.title: Dubai Frame Entry Ticket
dubai.description: Visit Dubai's newest iconic landmark - a 150-meter tall picture frame offering spectacular views of old and new Dubai. The Sky Deck features a thrilling glass floor walkway. Learn about Dubai's evolution through immersive museum galleries.
dubai.shortDescription: Entry to Dubai Frame with Sky Deck glass floor experience

dubai.title: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo Ticket
dubai.description: Discover the incredible underwater world at one of the world's largest suspended aquariums. Home to over 33,000 aquatic animals including sharks, rays, and the largest collection of sand tiger sharks. Walk through the 48-meter tunnel for a mesmerizing experience.
dubai.shortDescription: Entry to Dubai Mall aquarium with 33,000+ marine animals

dubai.title: Dhow Cruise Dubai Marina with Dinner Buffet
dubai.description: Sail along the stunning Dubai Marina aboard a traditional wooden dhow. Enjoy a lavish international buffet dinner while taking in the glittering skyline of Marina's skyscrapers. Entertainment includes live music and Tanoura dance performance.
dubai.shortDescription: 2-hour dinner cruise along Dubai Marina with entertainment

maldives.title: Sunset Dolphin Cruise with Snorkeling
maldives.description: Set sail into the Indian Ocean for an unforgettable dolphin watching experience. Spot pods of spinner dolphins in their natural habitat as the sun sets over the horizon. Includes snorkeling stop at a pristine reef with equipment provided.
maldives.shortDescription: Sunset cruise with dolphin spotting and reef snorkeling

maldives.title: Manta Ray Night Snorkeling Experience
maldives.description: Witness the magical sight of manta rays feeding under underwater lights. Professional guides take you to the best manta feeding stations where these gentle giants perform their aquatic ballet. An extraordinary once-in-a-lifetime experience.
maldives.shortDescription: Night snorkeling with manta rays at feeding stations

maldives.title: Private Sandbank Picnic & Snorkeling Trip
maldives.description: Escape to your own private sandbank in the middle of the ocean. Enjoy a champagne picnic on pristine white sand surrounded by turquoise waters. Includes snorkeling at nearby coral gardens and beach games.
maldives.shortDescription: Private sandbank experience with picnic and snorkeling

bali.title: Tegallalang Rice Terraces & Ubud Day Tour
bali.description: Discover Bali's cultural heart with this comprehensive Ubud tour. Visit the iconic Tegallalang rice terraces, sacred Tirta Empul water temple, Ubud Monkey Forest, and traditional craft villages. Includes authentic Balinese lunch overlooking the rice paddies.
bali.shortDescription: Full-day Ubud tour with rice terraces, temples and monkey forest

bali.title: Mount Batur Sunrise Trek with Breakfast
bali.description: Trek to the summit of Mount Batur volcano for an unforgettable sunrise experience. Watch the sun rise over Mount Agung and Lake Batur while enjoying eggs cooked by volcanic steam. A challenging but rewarding early morning adventure.
bali.shortDescription: Sunrise volcano trek with volcanic steam breakfast

bali.title: Tanah Lot Temple Sunset Tour
bali.description: Visit Bali's most photographed temple perched on a rocky outcrop in the sea. Time your visit for the magical sunset when the temple is silhouetted against the sky. Includes stops at Taman Ayun royal temple and local coffee plantation.
bali.shortDescription: Sunset at iconic sea temple with royal temple visit

bali.title: Bali Swing & Waterfall Instagram Tour
bali.description: Get the perfect Instagram photos at Bali's famous giant swings overlooking the jungle. Visit multiple swing locations with different backdrops, plus stunning Tegenungan Waterfall. Professional photographer available to capture your moments.
bali.shortDescription: Giant swing experience with waterfall and photo ops

bali.title: Traditional Balinese Spa & Massage Experience
bali.description: Indulge in authentic Balinese healing traditions with a 2-hour spa journey. Includes traditional Balinese massage, body scrub with local ingredients, flower bath, and herbal refreshments. Set in a tranquil garden spa setting.
bali.shortDescription: 2-hour traditional spa with massage, scrub and flower bath

bangkok.title: Grand Palace & Emerald Buddha Half-Day Tour
bangkok.description: Explore Thailand's most sacred and spectacular landmark - the Grand Palace complex and Wat Phra Kaew temple housing the revered Emerald Buddha. Expert guide explains the intricate history and symbolism of this 150-year-old royal compound.
bangkok.shortDescription: Guided tour of Grand Palace and Temple of the Emerald Buddha

bangkok.title: Floating Markets & Railway Market Day Trip
bangkok.description: Experience authentic Thai market culture at Damnoen Saduak floating market and the famous Maeklong Railway Market. Watch vendors scramble as trains pass through the market on active tracks. Includes long-tail boat ride and local tastings.
bangkok.shortDescription: Visit floating market and unique railway market with boat ride

bangkok.title: Thai Cooking Class with Market Tour
bangkok.description: Learn to cook authentic Thai dishes with a local chef. Start with a guided tour of a local market to select fresh ingredients, then prepare 4 classic Thai dishes including pad thai, green curry, and mango sticky rice. Take home recipe booklet.
bangkok.shortDescription: Hands-on cooking class with market visit and 4 dishes

phuket.title: Phi Phi Islands Speedboat Day Trip
phuket.description: Visit the stunning Phi Phi Islands made famous by 'The Beach'. Swim and snorkel in crystal clear waters, visit Maya Bay (if open), and explore Viking Cave and Monkey Beach. Includes lunch on Phi Phi Don island.
phuket.shortDescription: Full-day speedboat tour to Phi Phi Islands with snorkeling

phuket.title: James Bond Island & Phang Nga Bay Tour
phuket.description: Cruise through the dramatic limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay to the iconic James Bond Island (Khao Phing Kan). Kayak through sea caves and mangroves, visit the floating Muslim village of Koh Panyee.
phuket.shortDescription: Phang Nga Bay cruise with James Bond Island and sea kayaking

phuket.title: Phuket Old Town Walking Food Tour
phuket.description: Discover Phuket's rich Sino-Portuguese heritage on this evening food tour. Sample 10+ local dishes from street vendors and family-run restaurants. Visit colorful shrines, learn about local history, and taste authentic Phuket specialties.
phuket.shortDescription: Evening food tour with 10+ tastings in historic Old Town

paris.title: Eiffel Tower Summit Access with Skip-the-Line
paris.description: Skip the notoriously long queues with direct access to the Eiffel Tower summit. Your guide shares fascinating history and facts during the elevator ride to the top. Enjoy champagne at the summit bar with 360-degree views of Paris.
paris.shortDescription: Skip-the-line summit access with optional champagne

paris.title: Louvre Museum Skip-the-Line Guided Tour
paris.description: Navigate the world's largest museum with an expert art historian. See the Mona Lisa, Venus de Milo, and Winged Victory while learning the stories behind these masterpieces. Small group ensures personalized attention.
paris.shortDescription: 2.5-hour guided tour of Louvre highlights with skip-the-line

paris.title: Seine River Dinner Cruise with Live Music
paris.description: Glide past illuminated Paris landmarks aboard a glass-enclosed boat. Enjoy a gourmet French dinner with wine pairings while live musicians serenade you. Pass the Eiffel Tower, Notre-Dame, and Musee d'Orsay.
paris.shortDescription: Gourmet dinner cruise with wine and live entertainment

paris.title: Versailles Palace Full-Day Tour with Gardens
paris.description: Explore the opulent Palace of Versailles with skip-the-line access. Tour the Hall of Mirrors, King's Grand Apartments, and Marie Antoinette's chambers. Wander the magnificent gardens with optional fountain show.
paris.shortDescription: Full-day Versailles tour with palace and gardens

paris.title: Montmartre & Sacre-Coeur Walking Tour
paris.description: Discover the artistic heart of Paris in Montmartre. Follow in the footsteps of Picasso, Van Gogh, and Toulouse-Lautrec. Visit the stunning Sacre-Coeur basilica, Place du Tertre artists' square, and hidden vineyard.
paris.shortDescription: Walking tour through artistic Montmartre with Sacre-Coeur

rome.title: Colosseum Underground & Arena Floor Tour
rome.description: Access areas of the Colosseum not open to regular visitors. Descend into the underground chambers where gladiators and wild animals awaited their fate. Walk on the reconstructed arena floor for a gladiator's perspective.
rome.shortDescription: Exclusive underground and arena floor access with guide

rome.title: Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel Early Access
rome.description: Enter the Vatican Museums before the crowds arrive. Enjoy the galleries in relative peace, culminating in the awe-inspiring Sistine Chapel. Small group tour ensures intimate experience of Michelangelo's masterpiece ceiling.
rome.shortDescription: Early morning Vatican tour with uncrowded Sistine Chapel

rome.title: Authentic Italian Pasta Making Class
rome.description: Learn the art of handmade pasta from a Roman nonna (grandmother). Make three types of fresh pasta from scratch, including classic fettuccine and filled ravioli. Enjoy your creations with wine in a traditional trattoria setting.
rome.shortDescription: Hands-on pasta making with Roman chef and wine lunch

rome.title: Trastevere Food Tour with Wine Tastings
rome.description: Explore Rome's most authentic neighborhood for food on this evening tasting tour. Sample supplì (Roman arancini), pizza al taglio, artisanal gelato, and regional wines. Visit family-run establishments away from tourist traps.
rome.shortDescription: Evening food walk through Trastevere with 5+ tastings

barcelona.title: Sagrada Familia Skip-the-Line with Tower Access
barcelona.description: Marvel at Gaudi's unfinished masterpiece with skip-the-line entry. Explore the extraordinary interior filled with light streaming through stained glass. Ascend a tower for breathtaking views over Barcelona.
barcelona.shortDescription: Skip-the-line Sagrada Familia tour with tower access

barcelona.title: Park Guell & Gaudi Houses Walking Tour
barcelona.description: Discover Gaudi's whimsical world at Park Guell with reserved entry. Continue to Casa Batllo and Casa Mila on the elegant Passeig de Gracia. Learn about Gaudi's unique architectural philosophy and nature-inspired designs.
barcelona.shortDescription: Gaudi architecture tour including Park Guell and houses

barcelona.title: Barcelona Tapas & Wine Tasting Evening Tour
barcelona.description: Experience authentic Catalan cuisine on this evening tapas crawl through the Gothic Quarter. Visit 4 traditional bodegas and taverns, sampling local specialties like patatas bravas, jamón ibérico, and regional wines and cava.
barcelona.shortDescription: Evening tapas tour with 4 stops and wine pairings

barcelona.title: Flamenco Show at Tablao Cordobes
barcelona.description: Experience the passion of flamenco at one of Barcelona's most prestigious tablaos. World-class performers deliver an intense, emotional show featuring guitar, song, and dance. Optional dinner featuring Catalan cuisine.
barcelona.shortDescription: Authentic flamenco performance at historic tablao

santorini.title: Santorini Sunset Catamaran Cruise with BBQ & Drinks
santorini.description: Sail around Santorini's caldera aboard a luxury catamaran. Swim at the hot springs, snorkel in crystal waters, and watch the famous Oia sunset from the sea. Includes BBQ dinner and unlimited drinks.
santorini.shortDescription: 5-hour catamaran cruise with sunset, BBQ and open bar

santorini.title: Santorini Wine Tour with Vineyard Lunch
santorini.description: Discover Santorini's unique volcanic wines on this scenic tour. Visit 3 traditional wineries, sampling indigenous varieties like Assyrtiko. Learn about the island's distinctive basket-style vine cultivation. Lunch at vineyard with caldera views.
santorini.shortDescription: Wine tasting at 3 wineries with vineyard lunch

santorini.title: Akrotiri Archaeological Site & Red Beach Tour
santorini.description: Explore the 'Pompeii of the Aegean' - the ancient Minoan city buried by volcanic eruption 3,600 years ago. Continue to the dramatic Red Beach and traditional village of Emporio. Expert archaeologist guide brings history to life.
santorini.shortDescription: Ancient ruins tour with Red Beach and village visit

london.title: Tower of London & Crown Jewels Early Access Tour
london.description: Enter the Tower of London before the general public for uncrowded access to the Crown Jewels. A Yeoman Warder shares colorful tales of royal intrigue, executions, and the famous ravens. Explore the White Tower and Bloody Tower.
london.shortDescription: Early access to Tower of London and Crown Jewels

london.title: Warner Bros. Studio Tour - The Making of Harry Potter
london.description: Step onto authentic sets from the Harry Potter films including the Great Hall, Diagon Alley, and Dumbledore's office. See original costumes, props, and creature effects. Includes butterbeer tasting and Platform 9 3/4 photo op.
london.shortDescription: Harry Potter studio tour with transport from London

london.title: Thames River Cruise with Afternoon Tea
london.description: Cruise past London's iconic landmarks while enjoying a traditional afternoon tea. Sail beneath Tower Bridge, past the Houses of Parliament, and the London Eye. Freshly baked scones, finger sandwiches, and fine teas served on board.
london.shortDescription: Sightseeing cruise with traditional afternoon tea service

london.title: Stonehenge & Bath Day Trip from London
london.description: Visit two UNESCO World Heritage sites in one day. Explore the mysterious Stonehenge with audio guide, then discover the elegant Georgian city of Bath including the Roman Baths. Free time to explore Bath Abbey and Royal Crescent.
london.shortDescription: Full-day tour to Stonehenge and Bath from London

new-york.title: Empire State Building Observatory Skip-the-Line
new-york.description: Skip the notoriously long lines for express access to the 86th floor open-air observation deck. On clear days, see views spanning 80 miles across five states. Optional 102nd floor Top Deck for ultimate panoramas.
new-york.shortDescription: Express access to Empire State Building observation deck

new-york.title: Statue of Liberty & Ellis Island Ferry Tour
new-york.description: Take the ferry to Liberty Island for close-up views of Lady Liberty. Reserve pedestal access for panoramic harbor views. Continue to Ellis Island to explore the Immigration Museum and search for ancestors who passed through.
new-york.shortDescription: Ferry tour to Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island with audio guide

new-york.title: Broadway Show Ticket - Top Current Shows
new-york.description: Experience the magic of Broadway with tickets to a current hit show. Choose from award-winning musicals like Hamilton, The Lion King, Wicked, or current favorites. Premium or standard seating options available.
new-york.shortDescription: Tickets to top Broadway musicals with seating choice

new-york.title: Central Park Bike Tour
new-york.description: Explore Central Park's 843 acres by bike with an expert guide. Visit Bethesda Fountain, Bow Bridge, Strawberry Fields, and the Jacqueline Kennedy Reservoir. Learn fascinating stories about this urban oasis.
new-york.shortDescription: 2-hour guided bike tour through Central Park highlights

tokyo.title: Mt. Fuji & Hakone Day Trip with Lake Cruise
tokyo.description: Journey to Japan's iconic Mount Fuji with stops at the 5th Station (weather permitting). Cruise across Lake Ashi with views of Fuji's reflection. Experience the Hakone Ropeway over volcanic valleys and visit a traditional onsen town.
tokyo.shortDescription: Full-day Mt. Fuji tour with lake cruise and ropeway

tokyo.title: Tsukiji Outer Market Food Tour
tokyo.description: Explore Tokyo's famous fish market neighborhood with a local foodie guide. Sample 10+ dishes including fresh sushi, tamagoyaki (Japanese omelette), wagyu beef, and seasonal specialties. Learn about Japanese food culture and etiquette.
tokyo.shortDescription: 3-hour food tour with 10+ tastings at Tsukiji market

tokyo.title: Traditional Tea Ceremony Experience
tokyo.description: Participate in an authentic Japanese tea ceremony in a traditional tatami room. Learn the history and philosophy of the Way of Tea (Chado). A tea master guides you through the precise ritual while explaining the significance of each movement.
tokyo.shortDescription: Authentic tea ceremony in traditional setting with master

tokyo.title: Robot Restaurant Dinner Show
tokyo.description: Experience Tokyo's wildest entertainment at the famous Robot Restaurant in Shinjuku. Giant robots, laser lights, taiko drums, and dancers create an unforgettable sensory experience. Optional bento dinner before the show.
tokyo.shortDescription: Crazy robot show in Shinjuku with dinner option

singapore.title: Gardens by the Bay with Cloud Forest & Flower Dome
singapore.description: Explore Singapore's stunning futuristic gardens. Walk through the cool Cloud Forest's misty mountain environment with the world's tallest indoor waterfall. Discover the Mediterranean and South African plants in the Flower Dome conservatory.
singapore.shortDescription: Entry to both conservatories at Gardens by the Bay

singapore.title: Universal Studios Singapore Full-Day Pass
singapore.description: Experience Southeast Asia's only Universal Studios with 24 rides and attractions across 7 themed zones. Ride the Transformers, Battlestar Galactica roller coasters, and meet your favorite characters. Express passes available.
singapore.shortDescription: Full-day access to all rides and attractions

singapore.title: Singapore Night Safari
singapore.description: Visit the world's first nocturnal zoo, home to 900+ animals from 100 species. Take the guided tram ride through 7 geographical zones, then explore walking trails to see animals in naturalistic nighttime habitats.
singapore.shortDescription: Nighttime zoo experience with tram and walking trails

singapore.title: Singapore Food Tour - Hawker Centre Experience
singapore.description: Discover why Singapore is Asia's food capital with visits to famous hawker centres. Sample 10+ iconic dishes including Hainanese chicken rice, laksa, char kway teow, and chili crab. Local foodie guide shares history and secrets.
singapore.shortDescription: Food tour with 10+ dishes at legendary hawker centres

amsterdam.title: Anne Frank House Skip-the-Line Tour
amsterdam.description: Visit the poignant hiding place where Anne Frank wrote her famous diary. Skip the notoriously long queues with timed entry. An expert guide provides historical context about the Frank family and life in Nazi-occupied Amsterdam.
amsterdam.shortDescription: Skip-the-line entry to Anne Frank House with guide

amsterdam.title: Van Gogh Museum Skip-the-Line Ticket
amsterdam.description: Explore the world's largest collection of Van Gogh's works with priority access. See masterpieces including Sunflowers, Almond Blossom, and The Bedroom. Audio guide traces Van Gogh's artistic journey from early works to his final paintings.
amsterdam.shortDescription: Priority access to Van Gogh Museum with audio guide

amsterdam.title: Amsterdam Evening Canal Cruise with Drinks
amsterdam.description: See Amsterdam's UNESCO World Heritage canals illuminated at night. Cruise past the famous canal houses, bridges, and houseboats while enjoying unlimited drinks. Commentary shares the history of the Golden Age merchants who built these waterways.
amsterdam.shortDescription: Evening canal cruise with unlimited drinks and commentary

hong-kong.title: Victoria Peak Tram & Sky Terrace Combo
hong-kong.description: Ride the historic Peak Tram (since 1888) to Victoria Peak for Hong Kong's most famous view. The Sky Terrace 428 is the city's highest viewing platform with 360-degree panoramas. Best at sunset when the skyline lights up.
hong-kong.shortDescription: Peak Tram ride and Sky Terrace 428 access

hong-kong.title: Hong Kong Disneyland Ticket with Transport
hong-kong.description: Spend a magical day at Hong Kong Disneyland with 7 themed lands and 100+ attractions. Meet Mickey and friends, ride Space Mountain, and watch the spectacular nighttime fireworks over Sleeping Beauty Castle.
hong-kong.shortDescription: Full-day Disneyland access with round-trip transfer

hong-kong.title: Big Buddha & Ngong Ping 360 Crystal Cabin
hong-kong.description: Ride the Ngong Ping 360 cable car with its glass-bottom crystal cabin for thrilling views. Visit the giant Tian Tan Buddha statue and Po Lin Monastery. Explore the traditional Ngong Ping Village with restaurants and shops.
hong-kong.shortDescription: Crystal cabin cable car and Big Buddha visit

cairo.title: Pyramids of Giza & Sphinx Private Tour with Camel Ride
cairo.description: Explore the last surviving Wonder of the Ancient World with a private Egyptologist guide. Enter the Great Pyramid of Khufu, photograph the Sphinx, and ride a camel across the desert with the pyramids as backdrop.
cairo.shortDescription: Private tour of Giza pyramids with camel ride

cairo.title: Egyptian Museum & Old Cairo Full-Day Tour
cairo.description: Discover 5,000 years of Egyptian history at the Egyptian Museum, including Tutankhamun's golden treasures. Continue to Islamic Cairo's medieval mosques and bazaars, then visit the ancient Coptic churches of Old Cairo.
cairo.shortDescription: Full-day tour of museum and historic Cairo districts

cairo.title: Nile River Felucca Cruise with Egyptian Dinner
cairo.description: Sail the Nile on a traditional felucca boat as the Cairo skyline reflects on the water. Enjoy an authentic Egyptian dinner of mezze, grilled meats, and traditional desserts. Live oud music creates an atmospheric evening.
cairo.shortDescription: Traditional sailboat cruise with dinner and music
